article.headline: Holy Cross 70, Army 54, OT
article.story: WEST POINT, N.Y. (AP) -- Keith Simmons scored 26 points to lead Holy Cross in an overtime victory over Army Tuesday night. Torey Thomas had 14 points and Time Clifford added 11 for Holy Cross (19-6, 10-0 Patriot League). Jarell Brown led Army with 21 points, while Matt Bell contributed 12 points and Josh Miller scored 10 for Army (13-11, 3-6). The score was tied 6 times, stalling at 52-all at the end of the second half and forcing an overtime. Holy Cross had an 18-2 overtime run to squash Army's attempts. The Crusaders finished with a 46 percent shooting average, while Army shot just 33.3 percent for the game. Holy Cross outrebounded Army 37-26.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
